EmailTemplate.name: 02-14-23 CP Global Channel SKO 2023 Invite.CP Global Channel SKO 2023 Invite Ema
EmailTemplate.subject: Save the date: Global Channel Sales Kickoff 2023
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Save the date: Global Channel Sales Kickoff 2023 Dear Valued Channel Partners, We hope 2023 is off to a great start and that you are as excited as we are for the opportunities that lie ahead. To connect as a global channel community and align on our strategy and key focus areas for the year, please save the date to join our Global Channel Sales Kickoff webinar <[[https://app.wc1.kontiki.com/event/ln8dvepvcp]]> on Thursday, March 9. During the kickoff, we will explore the Transform. Connect. Run. approach we recently introduced in greater detail, and how we execute that strategy with our shared customers. We will also celebrate the successes of 2022 and where we need to focus to best build on that momentum to achieve even more in 2023. Additionally, you will hear industry-specific highlights from our channel sales leaders and a preview of what is to come as we work together to serve our shared customers and continue growing. Registration is now open <[[https://app.wc1.kontiki.com/event/ln8dvepvcp]]>, so please make sure you and your teams are signed up: Global Channel Sales Kickoff 2023: Virtual webinar Date: Thursday, March 9, 2023 Time: 10:30 a.m.–12:30 p.m. Eastern Time Location: Virtual webcast (click here <[[https://app.wc1.kontiki.com/event/ln8dvepvcp]]> to register) If you have any questions or need additional information, please reach out to your channel account manager or email ChannelSales.NCR@ncr.com. We look forward to sharing more details with you and to working together to have our best year yet! Best regards, The NCR Partner Network Team <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
